message:
THE FIX: Remove solid drawable from ripple_card foreground

ROOT CAUSE FINALLY IDENTIFIED:
android:foreground=ripple_card was rendering bg_card_modern
bg_card_modern = solid oneui_card color (dark gray)
This was layered ON TOP of the colored backgrounds

The ripple foreground was literally painting over everything!

FIX:
Removed <item android:drawable=bg_card_modern/> from ripple_card.xml
Ripple effect still works, but no longer obscures parent background

RESULT:
Colors will now be fully visible across entire tile surface
Ripple touch effect preserved (overlay_light_20 on tap)
